pages.text: $(li)The Forest is simple biome with a good variety of different kind of trees.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find mainly Birch trees and Oak trees.

$(li)Some animals such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/deer)Deer$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/raccoon)Raccoons$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/wolf)Wolves$(/l) can be found walking around here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
